Wheaton.Bloomingdale Church:
Bloomingdale Church is a Christian & Missionary Alliance church located in Bloomingdale, Illinois, US. David Riemenschneider, the founder of Bloomingdale Church, is the lead pastor. The church employs prospective CMA missionaries and has sent many of them overseas.


== History ==
Bloomingdale Church began as a new congregation on April 2, 1978.
